thread.title: Combat canines mistreated by Army: Pentagon report

title: Combat canines mistreated by Army: Pentagon report
text:
Combat canines mistreated by Army: Pentagon report Friday, March 02, 2018 - 01:46 
Heroic dogs that sniffed out roadside bombs while on patrol with American soldiers were mistreated by the U.S. Army when they returned home, according to a report from the Department of Defense's inspector general.   
Heroic dogs that sniffed out roadside bombs while on patrol with American soldiers were mistreated by the U.S. Army when they returned home, according to a report from the Department of Defense's inspector general.  //reut.rs/2oLLYVf
